page.title: 07Springfield Recreation
page.content: Here is a selection of{games}played by children.{Rounders}is a game of batting a ball and running. Two teams play this game,one batting and one fielding. A bat and ball and four bases placed in a square are needed. The bowler bowls the ball to the batsman who hits it with the bat and then runs round the 4 bases,while the fielding team tries to touch a base with the ball before the batsman arrives there.{White Horse}is a game where people stand like statues. One person turns his back on the others who try to creep up behind him. When this person turns round the others must stand like statues. The object of the game is to reach safety and shout "White Horse" without being caught moving.
